query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.apiId,
  p.ourPrice,
  p.quantityAvailable,
  s.name as serviceName,
  c.name as countryName,
  a.name as apiName
FROM prices p
JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.smshubCode = 'wa'
  AND c.id = 1
  AND p.apiId = 1
LIMIT 1;
command:

SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.apiId,
  p.ourPrice,
  p.quantityAvailable,
  s.name as serviceName,
  c.name as countryName,
  a.name as apiName
FROM prices p
JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.smshubCode = 'wa'
  AND c.id = 1
  AND p.apiId = 1
LIMIT 1;
